timeline.message:
Fix Style Issues that were Previously False Negatives

Remove check for Constructors on a single line, We do this alot
Fix several methods without braces on their own lines
Fix incorrect indentation in a few files

Fix Style Issues that were Previously False Negatives

Remove check for Constructors on a single line, We do this alot
Fix several methods without braces on their own lines
Fix incorrect indentation in a few files

Fix Optional orElse

OrElse vs OrElseGet

timeline.bodyText: Because schema is non-final we can't just switch this to a lambda
timeline.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: I think actually this would actually be fine, but to make the rules happy we would have to reassign Scheme anyway so I figured we may as well just put the result in a local var
replies.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: We could refactor scheme detection into a method to make scheme effectively final here.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: Do we require the empty line?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText:
Yep, we actually did for the Private Constructors as well but we were ignoring that everywhere so I deleted that check
        <module name="RightCurly"> <!-- Java Style Guide: Nonempty blocks: K & R style -->
            <property name="option" value="alone"/>
            <property name="tokens" value="CLASS_DEF, **METHOD_DEF**, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT"/>
        </module>

Basically Check-style was just broken before (see my comment on this PR) and didn't work correctly on empty blocks.
replies.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: I don't suppose it's possible to make it okay to have the right curly on the line just after the method definition?
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: That is allowed, I'll change it
replies.author: RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: Does that allow us to turn it back on for private constructors without too much trouble?
replies.author: rdblue
RussellSpitzer

replies.bodyText: I think that's what we do in most places isn't it? I was hoping that with this update it wouldn't be too many places to change. Probably good to update them to all be standard, right?
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: But we can do that in a separate PR if you want to keep this one small.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.message: Switch to Effectively Local Scheme in Reader

Fix all Single Line Constructors

We decided to enforce no single line constructors

Fix Comments without Whitespace

Use todoComment rules as a CommentRegex to find comments which lead
with a word character. Flags these instances as a mistake.
